name: LocoMoon
description:
LOCOMOON, Inc. management reminds you to

  • handle regular arrivals timely
  • build many rails
  • offload last car of the train at the matching station
  • use emotional support giraffes to cry into when the stress is unbearable

No, we cannot stop the trains or offload several cars at the time.

Also, please do not orchestrate gratuitous train wrecks or draw rude pictures using rails as Dave did. Half of the system comes to see your asteroid now, Dave.

- Management
